website_summaries.verdict: Uses bio-enzymatic technology to "eat away" odor and stains. Half the price of detergent cleaners and just as effective on pet urine.
pros: Highly rated by pet owners to remove cat and dog urine and odor
Pro-tip: Shake the bottle before use to activate enzymes
cons: Odor increases for 24-48 hours as enzymes work
For some, this ammonia-like smell is intolerable and does not dissipate

website_summaries.verdict: A deep cleaning shampoo designed to work with your steam or water carpet shampooing machine.
pros: Uses an enzyme formula to eat away odors
Smells fresh when you are using it
Enzymes continue to work after you apply and clean until the carpet dries
cons: The enzymes in this carpet cleaner may smell very bad after initial use, it has to fully dry before it eliminates the odors

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this cleaning solution! It smells great it's not over powering at all. And really does the job. The stains were so bad but they all came out! See results!
customer_reviews.author: Sollysf

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: I like this carpet shampoo, and now realize that it has to fully dry to totally eliminate odor. It smells light and fresh while using to wash the carpet. I just have to be patient and let it dry completely to work effectively.
customer_reviews.author: MorningPerson

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have used Natures Miracle for many years. I own a rug doctor and use this in two ways. I make a concentrated spray bottle for stains and pretreat, then use the diluted version to clean the carpets. Has a fresh smell and takes almost anything out.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy B.

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Smells great in here carpets came out so nice. Going to go over them once more for the heavy soiled pet stains from my extremely old dog that has many accidents. Old super stained parts came almost all the way out. I've tried everything and this is the best shampoo so far. Others didn't even lift new messes like this stuff did to the old ones. And new ones completely lifted first run. Very pleased. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Quasimotos Bride

customer_reviews.title: NOT Unscented!!
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT unscented! It has a bad, strong chemical smell. As soon as I opened Amazon’s shipping box I could smell it - sealed, unopened and in a plastic bag! I can’t use this as it will stunk up my entire house and the smell is nauseating. I will be returning. Nature’s Miracle DOES make actual unscented spray that’s labeled as unscented on the bottle so I will be buying that.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Ruined my carpets! Pics of stains are my AFTER photo!
customer_reviews.text: This ruined our carpet. Followed the directions exactly. It was beautiful when first done, and I thought wow, we found something great! But as it dried my beige carpet had darker brown stains on it and the urine smell was much worse.... never using again. Now I have to find something to undo damage :(
customer_reviews.author: GNF

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Tried this product and it does work. However, it takes a bit after after cleaning carpet for smells to go away. Guess it takes a while for enzymes to work. The container states use as you would any other carpet cleaner. Does not really says to dilute or not. A bit expensive to use straight so I used about a 1.5 cups in machine and diluted to water mark. Seems to work well. Be sure to shake container. I use cold water as I do not know if hot water ruins enzymes. There is a lot of guess work here, but with a little trial and error you can figure out what works with your machine.
customer_reviews.author: B. Gravitt

customer_reviews.title: This actually works!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I didn't really smell and odd smell, as some of the reviews say. It almost swayed me from trying it. I am so glad I did. It was just delivered today, and I already did my living room. The carpet looks brand new, and it was pretty dirty and spotted by our entry way. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chelse Paige

customer_reviews.title: Really great product. Takes some time to work, but when it does it's amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. It took some time to figure out the perfect way to use this for my pet, but I finally figured out the best way to use it in my carpet shampooer and in a spray bottle. Does take time to remove the odor, and the carpet may need one or two extra cleanings before a real difference is noticed, but it is worth the wait. This is the only thing that has worked for me in removing old, built up urine smell.
customer_reviews.author: MaKenna Ort

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now!
customer_reviews.text: I tried everything to get the smell out of my carpet, and this was the only thing that worked!! Worked so well, the cats don't even go to the bathroom on the floor anymore!! A must buy for cat owners with carpet!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Godsend for stains- will remove vomit & #2 stains !!!
customer_reviews.text: I loooooove this stuff. I have cats, one who is prone to throwing up and sometimes there are protest poops. This stuff gets out all stains- even a Hershey squirt off of a beige rug. Yes that’s right. There is also no scrubbing required- spray multiple times if stain is dark but it works. I will only buy this pet stain remover for now on!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Brache

customer_reviews.title: I cleaned his room every week for a couple of weeks in a row and now his room no longer smells like dog pee
customer_reviews.text: My son has very thick carpet that my dog decided was her personal spot to pee. It wasn't until it was too late that we realized she was using his room. The room was unbearable! The doors are closed during the day and we walked in one day and were hit by a wall of pet urine. I cleaned his room every week for a couple of weeks in a row and now his room no longer smells like dog pee. I would dock it to 4 stars as I am less successful with my area rug. And can't seem to get the smell out. But overall I'm extremely satisfied, so the review stays at 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work! Couldn't even remove the smell of dog ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't Work! Couldn't even remove the smell of dog urine that soaked into my carpet after less than two weeks. Followed directions exact, even tripled the amount on application 3 times and smell is still in the carpet. Also had a bit of a reaction to this product due to the scent. Even though I ordered unscented. Very strong chemical smell. Comments aside, I decided to give this a chance after reading amazon reviews. Save yourself the money and buy a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Works- just not completely for urine.
customer_reviews.text: I give 3 stars because, while it took away the stains rather perfectly, it did not remove the odor completely. I shook it well as directed and followed the directions, but after fully letting the area dry, the urine smell is still there, at about 60% less than normal strength. It did, however, remove the dog smell. So I guess that’s good. My carpet doesn’t smell like dogs lay on it...just that faint dog urine smell. I’d still buy it for stain and normal dog smell removal, but hire a pro for the urine odor removal. The scented solution is pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm777

customer_reviews.title: Did not remove stain or dog odor from carpet.
customer_reviews.text: First pic is before. Second Pic is after. My Black Lab likes to lay in the same 3 spots in the living room.After about a year of owning our home we noticed these spots smell like dog pretty bad. (He has allergies and skin issues.) i bought this product after reading tons of reviews. I followed the directions on the bottle and shampooed the area last night. i went over the spots in several directions and pre-treated them. This morning after letting it dry over night the spots are still darker where he lays and still smell of dog. Dont waste your money... i hear vinegar works well so i will try that tonight.
customer_reviews.author: K. Andring

customer_reviews.title: Didnt clean my carpets
customer_reviews.text: Smelled nice, I seen many good reviews and gave it a go. Used in my carpet shampooer. I shook it up, went over carpet and stains, slowly in some areas, saturating and pulling up liquid. It initially did not appear clean. I waited until today. Carpet fully dry and doesn't look clean. I shampoo my carpets on a regular so I'm familiar with how to do it, although simple. Wont buy it again. Maybe you need to use it full strength? This did not work
customer_reviews.author: Tiana

customer_reviews.title: Do not dilute!
customer_reviews.text: Do not dilute with water even in a shampooer!!!!! I made the mistake of trusting the reviews/comments on how to use this in a shampooer, and the commenters said to mix 6 oz with water. Well, I thought this worked like crap and was upset because I've heard great things about this. I decided to look for the urine specific one and finally read the label myself and it very clearly states to not dilute. Shame on me for not reading for myself after getting the bottle. Worked well after that. I have super old carpet and a pup with anxiety, so nothing will work miracles for me, but it works great when used properly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: This product was amazing! You don't have to use a lot and ...
customer_reviews.text: I read quite a few reviews before trying this. I had attempted cleaning my carpets with a few other products and they didn't work at all. This product was amazing! You don't have to use a lot and I just put it right in my carpet cleaner. If you are trying to take care of dog pee, I heavily recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Jenni D.

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff, but takes days to work
customer_reviews.text: I went over our living room a few times with a rental cleaner and this shampoo. We had some pee spots that had soaked down into the padding. The fragrance in the shampoo made everything smell nice for a few hours, but then processed to smell like death for two days. I’m happy to say that after two days, all of the smells were gone.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mills

customer_reviews.title: The container leaked
customer_reviews.text: Would like to tell u what I thought of this cleaning solution, but I can't. I went to use it today, and I discovered that the bottle was empty. There was a tiny opening in the seam found on the bottom of the plastic container, and the entire contents must have leaked out. Luckily this was not a container of bleach or some sort of toxic substance - but it is still very annoying nonetheless. And a complete waste of money ! Nature's Miracle needs to use a better container that is not going to leak so easily at the seams !
customer_reviews.author: G. C.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell!
customer_reviews.text: I had used Nature's Miracle before so bought and used it again, not knowing that they had changed the ingredients. I learned the hard way. Used it to get rid of a cat odor and ended up with an odor so overpowering that we could not sit in the room and had to open the windows and leave the fan on. After 4 days it was still overwhelming. I do not recommend this product in this new formulation. It was horrible and I had to buy another product to get rid of the smell of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Judy G

customer_reviews.title: Got all of the smell out of our new carpet!
customer_reviews.text: We have a 7 month old Goldendoodle, and have carpet downstairs in our rooms. To say he has had accidents on the carpet would be an understatement. We are incredibly lucky to have found Nature's Miracle! This stuff is amazing! Not only did it help get the stain out, but the smell is completely gone! Couldn't have gone through the puppy stages without this!
customer_reviews.author: ohyeahkate

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfactory results
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because I have a new puppy who is not potty training well. I used it in my carpet cleaner conservatively since it is a smaller bottle. I was happy with the cleaning results immediately, and after a day or so noticed the odor was relatively gone. Sooo satisfying. Not long afterward my daughter asked to borrow my rug cleaner for an apartment she needed to clean. There had been quite a few pets and long term stains all over the carpet. She used the solution a bit stronger than I had and found it very successful in cleaning the heavy soiling. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Potak

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: Well to start I have four cats and two dogs. Believe me one of them at any giving time is making some kind of a mess, and the cleaner tackles the stains very well. I was even able to clean some stains from the past. But what impressed me the most was the grayish stains in areas like around the kitchen, the closet where I change my shoes. I was finally able to clean those areas like new. We have light beige carpet and I went through three carpet cleaning machine’s and wasn’t ever able to get them as clean as they are now! I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Macgyvered a carpet cleaning to test this product, worked great!
customer_reviews.text: We have a new puppy and have had lots of fun accidents on our carpets. We always try and clean up well but some secret puddles get missed and it all adds up, and our apartment was smelling a little pee-peey. We didn’t want to rent a carpet cleaner without knowing if this product worked so for this first time we a cleaning system with a pressure spray bottle (typically used for spraying plants), a scrub brush, and a shop-vac. Not the best system but it worked and our carpet has smelled great, no lingering orders. Next time we will actually rent a carpet cleaner and do it justice.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: cat pee is like kryptonite
customer_reviews.text: This works okay. I have a cat who is lazy and sometimes just doesn't feel like going down the basement stairs and instead uses a rug in the next room. This product takes away some of the pee odor but leaves some behind along witt another weird scent. Mixed together its not much better. Not sure what the answer is to getting rid of cat pee - you'd think with the technology we have today there would be something that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: RunnerGurl

customer_reviews.title: Does remove stains, Does not remove foul odors
customer_reviews.text: My carpet looks a lot better, this even pulled stains from spilled ink, the reason its getting 3 stars, not 5 is because it does not remove pet odors. My dog recently had surgery, after her surgery she had to stay inside, she missed her puppy pad a few times, even though I spot cleaned immediately after each accident and fully cleaned the carpet within 48 hours there’s still a dog pee smell. In stead of eliminating the small I think it pulled it out of the carpet pad and made it more obvious. It took 4 cleanings to get rod of the pee smell. I'm bot sure if it's actually gone or if I've grown immune to it.
customer_reviews.author: Billy &Heather

customer_reviews.title: Best carpet cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product I have used for cleaning my carpets! I have two dogs and constant disasters around the house. Cleans stains others could not and it has very little fragrance so it doesn't overwhelm and just cover up, great for sensitive people. I love that it has little to no foaming so that makes it easier on the machine. With the normal mentality of modern day advertising the product has to have foaming action to work properly, not true, it may help in some situations but is honestly a psychological trick to sell most products.
customer_reviews.author: turbodiesel97

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Smell
customer_reviews.text: Out of all the shampoo I've used in my Hoover carpet cleaner, this is by far the worst scented one. I don't know what was going on, if the lemon scent combined with the dirt in my carpet cleaner or what, but it smelled like poop. The smell was so off-putting, I re-shampooed my entire apartment after using this carpet cleaner. I'm a big fan of their dog shampoo line, so I'm pretty disappointed this doesn't even compare to how nice those are scented.
customer_reviews.author: HWeathers

customer_reviews.title: This stuff really is a miracle on carpets for pet stains, odors, even mud.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. I can't believe how cheap it is, considering it works far better than any other product I've tried for my carpet. My dog had a lot of accidents inside on the carpet when we first got him, this not only took the stain out, but the odor as well. It also worked for all the mud my dog had tracked in, causing about a 3 foot square of carpet to be a dark murkey color instead of light cream colored like the rest. I used this stuff on it with a carpet brush, let it soak about 2 minutes, then scrubbed it in. Stains were gone, carpet looks amazing again. I've included before and after pics.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: After a couple of weeks of fostering a puppy recovering from giardia, our carpets were ready for a deep clean that the spot cleaning just wasn't getting at. Our Rescue recommended this when it came on sale on Amazon, so I snapped it right up. My hubs used it in our steamcleaner, and honestly, you can't tell another dog was ever here. I think even the cat is happy he doesn't have to smell that "intruder" anymore. I highly recommend this for carpeted homes with animals of any sort. Eliminates the odor and doesn't leave a strong scent behind. I think we'll be ready soon for our next foster. Not sure how the cat feels about that...
customer_reviews.author: R F

customer_reviews.title: Useless!
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in this product. I have used Nature's Miracle products for years, so I felt confident in my purchase. This item did not meet my expectations. When used in my carpet cleaner, it did not remove the urine odors and did not remove all stains. I then put the product straight on the urine areas hoping the full strength solution would eliminate the odors, but it didn't. Instead, the odors are stronger than before! I used the entire bottle to clean about 500 square feet of carpet and now I need to buy another product and go through the effort of cleaning the carpets again. I am so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: CHANA

customer_reviews.title: Cut my carpet into pieces, this was my last resort (Great Product)
customer_reviews.text: So, if you’re dogs a POS like mine and you think that you’ll never be able to get rid of the pee stains/smell, try this. Seriously so happy with the end results. I took a black light to my carpet before (below) and it was AWFUL. After using this, there was literally nothing glowing with the black light test. Will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: stpinco

customer_reviews.title: The 'unscented' version has 'fragrance' listed in the ingredients. ...
customer_reviews.text: The 'unscented' version has 'fragrance' listed in the ingredients. Nature's Miracle should really reconsider the strength of the scent in all its products!
customer_reviews.author: MEH

customer_reviews.title: Carpets look new and smell great so I'm a very happy customer.
customer_reviews.text: I took pics but I just got a new phone so I'll post them later... I have to say the product worked as well as everyone said it would so I couldn't be happier. I couldn't wait to give this a try, it was worth the wait to use it. I had several pet stains that all came up. My rugs look new again so yeah you gotta give this a try I promise if it cleaned worked for me it should work for anyone. I also need to add that it helped with making my carpets smell better as well so that's a plus in its self.
customer_reviews.author: deebrown

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what my carpet needed
customer_reviews.text: Potty training a puppy is hard work. No matter how much you keep up with it, accidents happen. Thankfully I caught these bottles of Nature’s Miracle on sale. All three bottles that I ordered arrived in great condition, no leaks or damage at all. The directions on the label are easy to read and comprehend. This was used with my carpet cleaning machine. The carpet was left with a fresh smell but not over powering. No stiffness to the fibers after cleaning. We have used Nature’s Miracle for years, even without pet issues, just for the good cleaning qualities.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Simply amazing
customer_reviews.text: This product works wonder! We were potty training our puppy and accident happened so often at the beginning that we needed some thing quick to get rid of the odor and stain on our carpet. The reviews were fantastic so we gave it a shot, and I’m glad we did. It actually tackled a string of soft stool stain that I thought would never come off. It cleared the area after two cleanings and letting it sit for a day. The carpet looks great and no odor at all!! The smell of the product is strong at first but eases off quickly into a pleasant smell. I ordered 3 more right away. LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I was skeptical at first. I thought I have two toddlers there’s no way that this is gonna remove the horrible stains my poor carpets have suffered. I was wrong. This took up stains from years ago that have been baking into my carpet. I used it in my carpet cleaner as well and my whole living room looks brand new again. I couldn’t be happier will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Edwards

customer_reviews.title: DEFINITELY RECOMMEND for dark, mysterious stains!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in hopes of removing whatever damage my housemate would do to our carpet in our apartment, and to my chagrin, she did quite the damage! There were huge dark stains that were all over our carpet which really left me with little faith, but the next day, I used my steam vacuum with this solution and it took out all the stains! absolutely all of them! I was surprised and definitely pleased. However, it didn’t take our the smell from my apartment, which is probably due to it being old. but it also didn’t leave any other smell either, but it took out all the stains, so i’m happy! c: [My pictures above show before & after]
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa S.

customer_reviews.title: Where has this stuff been all my life?!?
customer_reviews.text: Look, I LOVE the look and the smell of freshly steam cleaned carpet. I steam clean every month. I used to buy bissel shampoo and yeah it smells good but holy mother of carpets this Nature's miracle stuff smells amazing!! It smells fresh and kinda lemony. And it actually cleaned better than any other carpet solution I've tried. AND IT'S CHEAPER. So yeah, from now on I'm only buying nature's miracle because the name of this stuff ain't lying :)
customer_reviews.author: Dasha

customer_reviews.title: Absolute must for pet parents (tiny human parents too!)
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Natures Miracle for years and it has never let me down. I've had or have every indoor animal/reptile you can imagine and have never had issues with lingering smells or stains from their accidents. I also have 3 young children and have used Natures Miracle to clean up a variety of body fluids, cloth diapers, ect, with great success. The scent is pleasant but some people find it a little strong, I use it for every carpet cleaning because it makes the house smell so fresh.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Actually works like it says it does
customer_reviews.text: Wow I have tried a lot of different carpet shampoos to get up dog pee from a incontinent small dog and this stuff actually works. They all claim to remove the odor but this stuff is the only one I have used that actually did it I would say the odor is about 85% gone after one quick shampoo with an upright carpet shampoo machine that’s not the greatest. The smell is a pleasant clean citrus smell that’s not that over bearing fake small most pet stain removers have. I will buy again, the jug is smaller than I expected but it works so I’m not going to complain. If you have pets this is the stuff to buy!
customer_reviews.author: LOFF

customer_reviews.title: Great product!  Nature's Miracle never disappoints.
customer_reviews.text: This product is remarkable, as is all of the Nature's Miracle line. I used this is my Hoover Steamvac (even though the instructions say to never use anything but Hoover brand shampoo). My dog was sick and had several accidents on my carpet . Also, my cat was sick and was vomiting in the same place, so the carpet was a mess. I used Nature's Miracle spot cleaner, but I felt it needed to be deep cleaned. I was thrilled when I saw that they made a carpet shampoo! The carpet came out great and you wouldn't believe the color of the water afterward. Gross. Would highly recommend if you have pets.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Better than expensive top brand stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have an old dog that has been peeing everywhere. Even though I lay pads down, she goes where ever. I've tried my carpet cleaner name brand products, like 6 different ones all claiming great pet odor elimination. Yea they're ok, but pricey. This stuff is great, and the price can't be beat! I also feel it's better for the carpet and air, as it's not a bunch of harsh chemicals. It doesn't fill your home with fragrance, it just removes the odor. But give it a day after you've used it to work it's magic, make sure it's dry. I just ordered 2 more bottles!
customer_reviews.author: Jules S.

customer_reviews.title: Works really well!! Best shampoo ever
customer_reviews.text: seriously the best shampoo ever. Used it the day it arrived and was so surprised with how well it cleaned I had to buy 2 more bottles. It maxed out and won’t let me buy anymore but if I could I’d buy more. Works really good!! We have three kids and three pets and so you can imagine what our carpet goes through everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Emily B.

customer_reviews.title: Does a pretty good job
customer_reviews.text: My downstairs carpets needed a good cleaning and usually I use my own mix but I found this pet stain shampoo and figured I would give it a shot. Works ok. I don't know if it works any better then your big name brands but it cost a lot less so I was pretty happy with it. It did do a good job of elminating any orders and left my carpet smelling a lot fresher then it did. So far I have been really happy with the purchase as it was cheaper then most cleaners at the store and does just as a good a job.
customer_reviews.author: Robotica Industries

customer_reviews.title: Only thing that worked
customer_reviews.text: Like the title says it’s the only thing that worked to get pet stains out of my carpet. I had a friend dog sit for me and unfortunately the dogs somehow got into my bedroom and had some accidents. Well let’s just say my friend wasn’t sure how to clean up the mess and the stains set. My wife tried multiple name brand cleaners as well as some home remedies to no avail. Until we found this product and it works so well she bought two more to have on hand just in case. We definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Halstead

customer_reviews.title: Great product 10 stars if I could give it.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3 bottles one was leaking that was returned no issue replacement being sent. Cleaned a very light colored carpet with several spots from older cat getting sick (vomit). This product is FANTASTIC. Pre-treated stained areas let sit for about 20 minutes, then shampooed. Turned out perfect 10 stars in my book, very mild neutral scent. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Joni

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THE RESULTS!
customer_reviews.text: I just want to compliment the makers of this fine product, Nature's Miracle Deep Cleaning Pet Stain and Odor Remover, which cleans better than the name brands I had been using and at a very reasonable price. Smells fresh, removes stains, less suds so easier to rinse and empty. I had read other customer's satisfaction with the product, and just wanted to add my thankfulness over finding such a wonderful shampoo for my carpets. I have a small dog, but would highly recommend it for any household with or without pets. You will Love The Results!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: My husky is a fking MONSTER and I cant handle this without this cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Seriously. I would have killed myself if it wasn't for this cleaner. My boyfriend decided he wanted a new puppy... and she decided that she likes to poop on the carpet. It was liquid. A brown liquid ocean. Up until this point, I only really used this cleaner for small pee spots. My carpet was poop brown. It was caked in there. Just... soaking all the way down.... The smell was so bad. Naturally, I dumped this cleaner on it, sure I most likely poured too much in the panic. I now have no idea where that spot was in our house. I can't find it because I can't see any hints of it.
customer_reviews.author: K T

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff man
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What a game changer!! I purchased this product on a recommendation from a Facebook group I’m in. My son throws his sippy cup all over our carpeted room, and sometimes little dribbles come out that you can’t see u til someone has walked over them and they’ve dried, leave little dirt dots (ughhh) anywho, I got the product to try out because resolve wasn’t cutting it, and wow! It got all the little spots out without too much muscle. I’ve very please with this product, my only complaint is that it’s currently unavailable and I can’t order more yet.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Pelham

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves this Cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner works perfect in our Bissell carpet scrubber. The scent is very pleasant and leaves the carpets smelling fresh and clean. Spray it on and let it set for a while. The results truly speak for themselves. We have purchased this product multiple times and will continue to use the Natures Miracle. 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Carter

customer_reviews.title: Removes odor
customer_reviews.text: If you’re suffering from cat or dog pee odors please just use this product!! Or other Natures Miracle products. For the sale price of $5, I’m very happy I ordered this. My cat had sprayed all over my new couch and carpet months ago before her vet appointment and it ruined everything. This is the absolute only cleaner that takes the odor away. I recommend drenching everything in this or purchasing the gallon sized. Buy multiple and do not use sparingly...it will pay off!!
customer_reviews.author: Frances Zaccagnino

customer_reviews.title: Rip off! Save the planet, buy diluted!
customer_reviews.text: VERY irritated that the product came in a 64 fluid ounce jug, I assume to trick consumers, like me, into thinking it was a good value. unlike other carpet shampoos, it was fully diluted! Could’ve just sent me 2.3 ounces (undiluted)And let me add water from the tap! what a WASTE of our planets resources!! I will never use this company again, sad, because I like One of their other products , but I can make a mixture w/cinnamon scent at home! Rip off
customer_reviews.author: gwen hanson

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This product works. I’ve used Nature’s for years and it’s saved the lives of a couple of dogs! It’s really important to blot up as much liquid as possible. Then briefly heat it warm in a microwave and apply copiously. Let us sit for perhaps 1/2 hour, then blot very thoroughly. You will want to repeat for odors that are set. If so, soak stain overnight and blot like crazy. Then put a fan on it. You’ve GOT to get all the water out! Prompt attention is best and absolutely necessary if stain is in concrete.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Takes time, may require multiple passes. Be patient.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to clean the areas that my cat had been repeatedly spraying. I was originally worried that the package would be too small, but i haven't had that be a problem. You may have to do several passes over different days to fully get rid of the smell. It seems like each pass will initially smell better, but then all of the cat urine that's been locked in the fibers comes out and it seems to smell worse. Every pass i use it it gets better and better, I will update when I've been able to do a couple more passes, hopefully I'll be able to fully get rid of the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Blotchy, inconsistent, color changing.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this product would do amazing on my beige rug since I had read alot of great reviews, but after using I am very upset. My rug is about 10 different shades of cream/beige/white right now. I feel like it is almost ruined just by looking at it and seeing how unappealing it now is. The product smells great, but it isn't consistent. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Horwath

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for urine smells.
customer_reviews.text: It has a very fresh scent that is all around pleasing. Not too strong or too light. I have a bissell pro heat I use for detailing the interior of my car as well as an occasional pet stain. You might spray an oxy booster first as it’s not really good with old stains. Wouldn’t rely on it removing red wine from white carpet but it does a great job at general cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.text: I tried shampooing the carpets with hydrogen peroxide first and the smell was awful for three days. I bought this and shampooed the carpets the day it came. The carpets and whole house smelled fresh. The scent was not an overwhelming scent but just smelled fresh and clean. The carpets even felt cleaner. I would definitely buy it again but that will be a while. I bought four bottles in anticipation of needing a lot because of how bad the smell was. Nope only used one bottle for and large living room hall and my kids room. The smell has not returned but I decided to never pet sit again.

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning up After Doggo
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after we moved to a new home and our doggo decided to start having a lot of accidents in our new home. And used it paired with our Green Machine and it's one of the better cleansers I've used. Initially I wasn't optimistic after smelling the contents but after mixing it in the tank and then using it it does an excellent job. I use about 2 oz per tank on the green machine with the hottest water I can provide and it does an excellent job. It may not have a strong smell but any underlying smell from the previous issue is eliminate and that's all I can ask.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Goblin

customer_reviews.title: Stains magically disappear while leaving a pleasant smell.
customer_reviews.text: Don't let the affordable price fool you. This is magic to your carpet and other items. I've lives in my apartment for 3 yrs. I've used this to spot clean on my carpet. My carpet looks practically new. Bonus! My daughter was on a flight returning from Qatar. The lady next to her spilled red wine on her Air Force baby blue Jordans. These shoes cost a little over $400. After flying for hrs, convinced her Jordans were destroyed this product pulled dried red wine out of the Jordans. Wow!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Cox

customer_reviews.title: This works well. can't complain about the cost.
customer_reviews.text: Other reviews say it has a funny smell. I found this product smells like lemon or lime when applied. I didn't have pee smell in my carpet, it was more of a 'dirty dog' musk smell. The cleaner removed all of the bad odor and when dry, had no odor. The carpet is fresh and kinda' stiff. I like this product. short nap carpet in a 19x21' family room. 6oz of product for 1 gallon of very hot water in a Hover spin scrub carpet cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Gandude

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good but not a miracle
customer_reviews.text: I've used Mr. Clean with Gain in my Bissel steam cleaner for years but decided I wanted to give this product a try. Overall it is a good carpet cleaner with a nice scent and a good price. However, it didn't eliminate some old spots I had and it didn't totally eliminate a 24 hour old light tea stain on the carpet. Honestly I think Mr. Clean works a bit better for a slightly cheaper price and a scent I prefer. But this is a good quality carpet cleaner. I just would recommend Mr. Clean over it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Ann Conroy

customer_reviews.title: Works very well, if you can stick with it a while
customer_reviews.text: I have a neutered male cat who neurotically marks the carpet anytime an animal is seen through the window. With a neighbor who walks his dogs past us every day, random stray cats, skunks, and even deer, this was a recipe for disaster. I used this with my shampooer every day for a week to get the smell all the way out. Then we restricted access to the area to avoid habitual marking and relocated his food dish to the area he most liked to mark. Lo and behold, we've got a citrusy fresh smelling room again, with no new marking in a month. Fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for pet stains!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 small dogs in my house. While most of the time they use the puppy pads there are always some accident here and there. I used this in my carpet cleaner and did every room in my house. My carpet looked, smelled, and felt SO clean! I’m not crazy about the scent as it’s very floral but it went away the next day. Worked well in the set in stains and made the carpet brand new
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Evans

customer_reviews.title: Truly a miracle !
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing!!! We have 15 year old white/cream carpet that was stained throughout the house from our dachshund’s occasionally accidents. There were dark brown splotches that just looked gross, not to mention the carpet just gave off a gross smell to the whole house. Used this shampoo in a carpet shampooed and it removed most of the spots (almost all of them were old and “set-in”). Have shampooed the carpet countless other times with bissell shampoo with no luck. Our carpet looks bright and almost new again!! Also removed that sour musty smell. Some people were commenting on the scent but I personally like it- it’s fresh and clean and once it dries it’s gone anyway.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: My only carpet cleaner solution!!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for 8+ years. I used it with house training both dogs and the occasional accident. As well as potty training kids! It took the urine and poop stains out from the dogs. No smell left behind. And with the toddler that was potty training, this is the only cleaner that removed the smell of human urine from the carpet! No stains or smells left behind! We have gotten our pet deposit back from every apartment we ever lived in. Now in our house, I am am avid user of it! It keeps my carpets fresh and clean from dogs and kids!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Robinette

customer_reviews.title: carptet shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I've used many brands and this was my first time with this product. I am very pleased and impressed. Not only does it smell really nice, but it cleans great.....my favorite part is that there isn't alot of suds, and the price was perfect along with the shipping time. Now I need to order more.....
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Seriously amazing. 10 stars if possible
customer_reviews.text: I dont have any pictures because I forgot to take them but this stuff is amazing. It not only smells great but took stains out of my carpet (from my lovely kids) that even the oxy stain removing stuff couldn't get out. I just love it. I just ordered two more bottles the other day. Its one of the few things I watch and each time it goes on sale I have to snag it up. Seriously this stuff is a blessing.
customer_reviews.author: mariah

customer_reviews.title: Just so so
customer_reviews.text: This product does seem to help neutralize odors but it didn’t get my carpet clean. The scent is pretty strong too and almost nauseating. Gave me a headache. However, as others have mentioned, once it dries you don’t notice any smell at all. I may try using more next time to see if my carpets come out cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Works well!!! I'm a picky person with smells and items living upto their hype. I won't sugar coat it. I got this jug for $5!! It's normally $30...so I tried it. I shampooed our couch with it. Did a great job. Shampooed 2 area rugs. Smelled fresh (lightly scented) and you couldn't smell lingering pee anymore. Good stuff...it will go quick though...so stock up if the deal is good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Product was different than the one in the store. The fragrance wasn’t there and it was watered down, not enough soap. It didn’t last at all. I’ve bought this product from pet stores and it last longer and the fragrance is stronger when I buy it from the pet stores.
customer_reviews.author: LW Feedback

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't planning on taking pics but after I cleaned half my rug and the pee stains came right out I felt I needed to. The pic shows before (top) and after (bottom) of the worst area. I was amazed it came out so easily after shampooing twice before. Unfortunately our puppy still goes in the same area and I was hoping this would break him of using the rug. Of course it may just be the rug and not him smelling his pee on it. This stuff smells much better than our usual carpet cleaner and for the price it is unbeatable. I will definitely be buying more of this!
customer_reviews.author: Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I had a roommate who for about a week let her dog poop and pee all over the room she was staying in. The reviews on this made me really optimistic with people saying they got the smell out of their carpets, carpet pads, hardwoods, but I was unable to achieve the same results. Maybe mine was set too deep or there was too much mess, but after using literally every Nature's Miracle product possible, the smell remained and I had to replace the carpet. It was much less than it was initially, but still very much there.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Combine a little with water in a jug and save on spot cleaning, too!
customer_reviews.text: Nice for home carpet shampooers. Really gets up tough Pet accidents if they are pre-treated. For ore-treatment Mix a pint (2 cups or 8 ounces) in a half gallon (32 ounce) jug (or one part concentrate to 4 parts water) and really save! Use hot water for better results or heat up in microwave before use if not using all right away for absolutely unnoticeable stain removal. Don’t get mad at your dog...put him on a regular schedule every day and treat him when he goes outside; you’ll use this less and less, but there are going to be accidents and rainy day, so have this as a back-up! Get rid of your stains, not your dog who loves you!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Smells Better
customer_reviews.text: For awhile my Chihuahua was going under the table in the living room and doing her business in the middle of the night. I didn't notice it at first until I started seeing yellow stains showing up on the carpet and smelling. I applied this product with my carpet shampooer and the smell is almost gone. I hope 1 more application will do the trick. I think because the smell was older is why it will take 2 application to rid smell completely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty light carpet so it’s so easy to stain. My husband spilled soda. And my usual carpet cleaner (oxyclean) wasn’t able to get the stain out. Saw that this was on sale, so I figured why not? I have friends who swore by this stuff anyway. To my surprise, It works so well! It got the stain out. The scent is also pleasant. Not too strong. I used it in my carpet cleaner, a Hoover power scrub elite.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: works well in conjunction with the cat urine destroyer
customer_reviews.text: I found this to be the best product to help with pet stains. The urine destroyer is really good at neutralizing the odor and removes most of the stain from the carpet but not all of it. The carpet cleaner gets the rest of the stain. I'm very pleased with the combination. On occasion, I've had to pre-treat an area or wash the carpet a couple of times to get it eye clean. The spots will still show on black light, but so long as I can't see them with the naked eye and they don't smell, I'm good.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Works Miracles!!!
customer_reviews.text: We got a new puppy a few months ago. At first, she was really good about going outside. Then, after a few weeks, she started going inside the house. We missed a few spots and the smell set in. We tried baking soda, vinegar, dish soap, other "enzyme" cleaners. Nothing helped. Then I saw a recommendation online about this stuff, and it worked wonders! I have never used a urine removal product that works as well as Nature's Miracle, even for set in smells and stains. I would recommend this to anyone who has pets!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle B

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent and cleaning!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to find rug shampoo for machines from Nature’s Miracle! I have 3 old dogs and accidents have increased a lot. This product has been terrific in getting stains out and of course neutralizing smells. I love it’s fresh scent and was blown away by how well it got up just basic dirt too. It’s price is so reasonable I can clean the carpets all the time and not worry about having to get mire!
customer_reviews.author: Kcdreams

customer_reviews.title: This really destroys cat urine!
customer_reviews.text: My cat decided he didn't want to pee in his very clean and large litter box anymore so he decided to use a corner of the living room, I used this with a carpet shampooer I bought by Bissell and it completely destroyed the odor and the stains better than any other product I tried. I pretreated with another Nature's Miracle product and then shampooed the area, my home smells so much better!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin M.

customer_reviews.title: Good product, worked as stated
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats and my upstairs floor is carpet. So I got a Hoover carpet cleaner during black Friday and wash the carpet once every other month. I felt the carpet cleaning solution the machine came with smells too artificial and some how don't feel totally cleaned. So I switched to this one based on my cat's friend's mother. Yes, this turned out to be much better than the one I used before.
customer_reviews.author: MurphySlaw

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE FOR PET OR KID PEOPLE!
customer_reviews.text: AS MOST PEOPLE HAVE MENTIONED,THERE IS A ODOR,BUT IN MY OPINION, ITS PLEASANT,AND GIVES ME THAT EXTRA "CLEAN" FEELING. I NOTICED AN AUTOMATIC DIFFERENCE IN SHADE WITH MY LIGHT TAN CARPET AS SOON AS I USED THIS PRODUCT. BY THE WAY,I HAVE A BISSELL 2X PET PRO REVOLUTION CARPET CLEANER MACHINE. NOTE,PLEASEEE MIX THE BOTTLE UP REAL GOOD BEFORE AND AFTER PLACING INTO YOUR MACHINE. WOULD RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: Shayla Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Helped with the problem significantly
customer_reviews.text: I used this with their other product. I have one cat that pees in this one spot for some reason. I've been trying to get rid of it and this and the other product seem to work well. The other product worked like a charm. I used this a few days after and it left the carpet very stiff in some spots, but that could have been me going over it a few times in one spot with realizing it. Overall, I'm happy. It worked better than other brands!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great Carpet Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This is, bar none, the best carpet shampoo I’ve ever used. This is a must if you have pets who have the occasional accident, or in my case, poo and pee terrorists, in the house. It removes the stain and the smell from the carpet. It also works tremendously well to get your carpets clean and fresh. The scent is very nice and keeps your carpet fragrant for days weeks after shampooing. I can’t recommend this product enough.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Devine

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff and was excited to receive a order as I hadn’t had the extra cash to steam clean our rugs for awhile. Sadly one of the bottles had leaked, so I only got about a bottle and a half rather then the two bottles I ordered and paid for. There was a sticker on the lip to hold it in place so it wouldn’t leak but it must have not been pushed down to hold on top the bottle as it wasn’t sticking but just free.
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn

customer_reviews.title: Best Pet Stain and Smell Carpet Cleaner I Have Found
customer_reviews.text: I love my cats but I hate the foul smells that they sometimes leave behind. This carpet shampoo works wonders to help get rid of the oopsies and temper flare up occasional territorial issues. You sometimes can't take all the boy out of the boys... if you know what I mean! We keep this on hand for those instances. Few and far between as they may be, this cleans up any mess we may have, just put some in our hand held carpet cleaner and we are good to go! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work to remove very old pet stains. It was clearly visible under a black light. On the flip side, the carpet smells a lot better than the previous condition it was in. I only use this on a carpet cleaner machine and after going bottle after bottle, it dawn on me that this can get really expensive quick. After all, one bottle is 1/2 gallon and my carpet machine takes 1 gallon of clean solution. You get the idea.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Why do people like this???
customer_reviews.text: I cannot express the depth of my disappointment. I have used more than a few types of carpet cleaner and this was hands down the least effective. I shampooed the room twice to get a reasonable visual improvement and then hoped for the best as it dried. The enzymes were gonna do thier thing, I was optimistic. I was wrong. This product is a jug of worthless lies.
customer_reviews.author: Ginni

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: smells like gasoline and the odor of gas stays and stays, it is gross. Does not remove stains. Does not remove the urine odor. You end up with a cross between gasoline and urine. It makes you cough, and it gags you big time!
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Dog pee eliminated.
customer_reviews.text: What a relief! We were fighting a mess that seeped through a thick rug, all over a heat mat, and into a wood floor. We tried everything else, and finally we used Nature's Miracle. MAKE SURE YOU LET IT SIT FOR A COUPLE OF DAYS. It does smell worse before it smells better! We mixed it with water and put it into our little green rug shampoo vac. I did both sides of the rug and the pad, then soaked the wood floor pretty good to get it into the cracks. The microbes must have eaten all the smelly bacteria because there is no trace now!
customer_reviews.author: Daviel

customer_reviews.title: Love the idea of natural products... But...
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is uses natural materials, but it doesn't do a great job on pet urine. I've used it as a spot treatment, and also in our cleaning machine. It cleans the carpet well, initially (or maybe it's masking the smell) but after a day or two the smell returns. Perhaps our old gal is particularly smelly, but I wouldn't buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Everything I Expected
customer_reviews.text: This was everything I anticipated to be. The reviews were so helpful so I figured it would be beneficial for others to know to trust the reviews! I purchased a house where the previous owners had 5 dogs. The dogs urinated in what seems like all rooms. Some carpet, some laminate. I used the Nature's Care in my new Bissell Pet Pro carpet shampooer and it cleaned, deodorized and neutralized the awful smells. I will be buying again to keep stock of it! This container was able to clean 2 bedrooms, 1 master bedroom and an entire living room and stairs and I STILL have some left over. This was based on the amount per the carpet cleaner manufacture
customer_reviews.author: Brandon B

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with this carpet cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This took the stink out of my carpet and a lot of dirt, too. It did not leave a smell behind that I could discern. I also did not have the issue that I read other people had with this intensifying the urine smell at first. That would have freaked me out, but I was expecting it. Of course the day after I shampooed all of my carpets, one of my dogs decided to pee right in the middle of my bedroom. I used this in my smaller carpet cleaner that's just for spots, and it took out all of the smell and stain right away. Darn dogs. You gotta love them. But you also need something like this.
customer_reviews.author: Fran Wickham

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is like magic in a bottle. Not only does it remove any visible stains from pet "accidents", it also removes the smell that usually lures the offender to return. I know there are already almost 1300 reviews about this product, but it works (If I lived alone, I'd simply use vinegar for cleaning/concealing pet potty areas, but that won't fly in my domicile, so I'll keep using this as long as they make it).
customer_reviews.author: Boheeber

customer_reviews.title: This product works just fine
customer_reviews.text: To address some of the top complaints: -No it did not ruin my carpets -Yes there is a pretty light scent, smells like chemical. Was not a super strong smell but definitely there. -Seemed to do a good job cleaning my carpets -The container did not leak at all My carpets were in okay shape already so I doubt this shampoo is a miracle worker. It's just an average shampoo at a good price. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product for pet owners
customer_reviews.text: I am an animal lover. I have 5 Ragdoll cats and wall to wall carpet. They have occasional accidents and I decided to try Natures Miracle Carpet Cleaner. I used it in my carpet cleaner and cleaned my entire carpet. It got rid of deep set stains and odors. I even used it to clean my furniture. If you are a pet owner, this is a must have! It will keep your home looking and smelling great.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnice E. Forshey

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: My dog has frequent UTI’s which add up to her peeing on the carpet from time to time. Can’t even get mad at her about it... totally not her fault. I have tried everything to get the odor out of my carpet and this might be the worst thing I’ve used. It does nothing to break down the stain. After my carpet dried, it honestly just looked like the urine spread into a much larger circle. I even put some in a spray bottle to pre-treat... but nada... no good. Definitely have better luck with the “oxi” containing stuff. Aka, peroxide. Still searching for something that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Mer1019

customer_reviews.title: Must have for pet owners
customer_reviews.text: Have been waiting for warmer weather. With the use of my personal CARPET CLEANER this was amazing. It to ONE(1) pass and cleaned my high traffic hall way. Not to mention i have FOUR INDOOR DOGS. One That tends to potty on my area rugs. This took the odor and stain out. I have tried other MAJOR brand cleaners BUT THIS is THEEE BEST 100000% The price is great
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: My New Rug Shampoo! :0)
customer_reviews.text: Nice Rug Shampoo! It came packed nice, no spills. It smells good, & it works good. I put mine in a spary bottle. And swept it with a extra broom I had. Came out great. Its a big bottle, and you don't need a whole lot. I sparyed 3 times, & swept the rug each time i sparyed. And it dried fast. Will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Lola from Harlem, New York

product_meta.title: Nature's Miracle Deep Cleaning Pet Stain and Odor Carpet Shampoo
product_meta.description: Size:Pack of 1Nature's Miracle Advanced Deep Cleaning Carpet Shampoo penetrates deep into carpet and upholstery fibers to remove old and new stains, odors and allergens, keeping your carpet and upholstery looking new longer. Advanced Deep Cleaning Carpet Shampoo contains Odor Lock technology for permanent and superior odor removal. Low foaming professional strength formula is designed to be used with any manufacturer's water based rug cleaning machine.
feature_bullets: Low-foaming formula is designed to be used with any water-based carpet cleaning machine or steam cleaner
Penetrates deep into carpet fibers to allow extraction of new and old stains, odors and allergens
Contains bio-enzymatic odor locking technology for permanent and superior odor removal
Color-bright formula with rug conditioners and brighteners

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
